item.title: Generation of Molecular Conformations using Generative Adversarial Neural Networks
item.description:
Congsheng Xu, Xiaomei Deng, Yi Lu, Peiyuan Yu, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4404496394
The accurate determination of a molecule’s accessible conformations is key to the success of studying its properties. Traditional computational methods for exploring the conformational space of molecules such as molecular...

item.title: Automated High-throughput Organic Crystal Structure Prediction via Population-based Sampling
item.description:
Qiang Zhu, Shinnosuke Hattori, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4404536367
With advancements in computational molecular modeling and powerful structure search methods, it is now possible to systematically screen crystal structures for small organic molecules. In this context, we introduce the...
item.author: Qiang Zhu, Shinnosuke Hattori
